c74object.name: abc.generator~
c74object.description: abc.generator~enables the generation of various sounds (noise, sinus, phasor). Generated sounds are pulsed at a certain frequency (pulse rate) and have a pulse ratio (or duty: ratio between sound and silence).

method.name: phasoron
method.description: sets the phasor generator (1 is on, 0 is off).
method.digest: sets the phasor generator (1 is on, 0 is off)

method.name: noiseon
method.description: sets the noise generator (1 is on, 0 is off).
method.digest: sets the noise generator (1 is on, 0 is off)

method.name: sinuson
method.description: sets the sinus generator (1 is on, 0 is off).
method.digest: sets the sinus generator (1 is on, 0 is off)

method.name: phasorfreq
method.description: sets the phasor frequency in Hz. [init=440:min=20:max=20000:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets the phasor frequency in Hz

method.name: phasorpulserate
method.description: sets the frequency of the phasor pulsation in Hz. [init=3:min=0.01:max=20:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets frequency of the phasor pulsation in Hz

method.name: phasorpulseratio
method.description: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the phasor. [init=1:min=0:max=10:step=1]
method.digest: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the phasor

method.name: sinusfreq
method.description: sets the sinus frequency in Hz. [init=440:min=20:max=20000:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets the sinus frequency in Hz

method.name: sinuspulserate
method.description: sets the frequency of the sinus pulsation in Hz. [init=3:min=0.01:max=20:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets frequency of the sinus pulsation in Hz

method.name: sinuspulseratio
method.description: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the sinus. [init=1:min=0:max=10:step=1]
method.digest: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the sinus

method.name: noisecutoff
method.description: sets the frequency of the low-pass filter on the noise. [init=1760:min=20:max=20000:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets the frequency of the low-pass filter on the noise.

method.name: noisepulserate
method.description: sets the frequency of the noise pulsation in Hz. [init=3:min=0.01:max=20:step=0.01]
method.digest: sets frequency of the noise pulsation in Hz

method.name: noisepulseratio
method.description: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the noise. [init=1:min=0:max=10:step=1]
method.digest: sets the ratio between sound and silence for the noise

method.name: gain
method.description: sets the general gain in dB. [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the general gain in dB
